title: Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
September 09, 2015

 



Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate





	NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:

	Richard Franklin Boulware, II, of Nevada, to be a Member of the United States Sentencing Commission for a term expiring October 31, 2019, vice Ketanji Brown Jackson, term expired.

	Charles R. Breyer, of California, to be a Member of the United States Sentencing Commission for a term expiring October 31, 2021. Â (Reappointment)
